page.title: 07Clubs-Harborne District Club
page.content: The Community Centre in our area is the main place for clubs. Different groups meet every weekday-daytimes & evenings. There are clubs & groups for men, women & children. Classes are held for people to learn different languages,to sing, play chess,make wine or perform plays together. The centre provides activities for the handicapped, retired and unemployed. In St. Mary's parish different groups meet every day. Brownies followed by ladies Â£Slim & Trim' on Monday; Dance on Tuesday; Over- 60's, Cubs, Â£Slim & Trim' on Wednesday; Guides on Friday; Youth Groups at weekends. Apart from school children, toddlers & babies learning to swim at Harborne Baths, facilities are also there for weight-training, judo, table-tennis & keep-fit.
